name: Am I Alone (Anjotube_JE)
description:
This is a mini Horror Game I made for Brackeys Game Jam 2022.2.

You woke up from school and found out everyone left. You went outside and see that no ones around. Its like a wasteland. But its getting late so you need to go home. While in bed you think to yourself "Am I Alone?" then you hear a scream outside. When you checked outside to take a look, He's There.

Controls

W/Space = Jump

A/D = Left/Right

Left Click = Interact With Doors
